snippet: Mr. Yassine was the charismatic religious leader of Morocco’s largest opposition movement and a longtime opponent of two Moroccan kings.
abstract: Abdessalam Yassine, charismatic religious leader of Morocco’s largest opposition movement and longtime opponent of two Moroccan kings, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Yassine was the charismatic religious leader of Morocco’s largest opposition movement and a longtime opponent of two Moroccan kings.

headline.main: Abdessalam Yassine, Leader of Moroccan Opposition Movement, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: Abdessalam Yassine, 84, Leader of Moroccan Opposition Movement
